  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_498</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_498</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Figuras mágicas</string>
            <string language="en">Magic figures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magische Abbildungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Figures magiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Figuras mágicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figure magiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγικοί αριθμοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones diferentes ejemplos de figuras mágicas. Se trata de que el alumno practique las operaciones aritméticas básicas utilizando diferentes rompecabezas numéricos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show different examples of magic figures to get the student to practise different arithmetic operations using numerical puzzles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">figuras mágicas</string>
            <string language="en">magic figures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rompecabezas</string>
            <string language="en">puzzles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">aritmética</string>
            <string language="en">arithmetic</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, unterschiedliche Beispiele der magischen Abbildungen zu 
zeigen, um den Kursteilnehmer zu veranlassen, unterschiedliche 
arithmetische Operationen mit numerischen Puzzlespielen zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de montrer différents exemples des figures magiques pour 
obliger l'étudiant à pratiquer différentes exécutions 
arithmétiques en utilisant des puzzles numériques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações mostrar 
exemplos diferentes de figuras mágicas para começar o estudante 
praticar operações aritméticas diferentes usando enigmas 
numéricos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni mostrare
gli esempi differenti delle figure magiche per convincere l'allievo a 
esercitarsi nei funzionamenti aritmetici differenti usando i puzzle 
numerici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εμφανίσει διαφορετικά παραδείγματα των μαγικών αριθμών για
να πάρει το σπουδαστή για να ασκήσει τις διαφορετικές αριθμητικές
διαδικασίες χρησιμοποιώντας τους αριθμητικούς γρίφους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magische Abbildungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Puzzlespiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
